meta.title: Home page
meta.description: Personal website of Ondřej Klíma - known on the internet under the nickname Klimondra. Find out more, not just about the resume and portfolio.

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.article:
My name is Ondřej Klíma, but in the online world you can know me by the nickname Klimondra. I am studying IT and programming at the High School of Applied Cybernetics in Hradec Králové. Computers and software have fascinated me since I was a child. Around the age of thirteen, I started learning to create websites using HTML and CSS and gradually tried other technologies, such as Python or C#.

Currently, I am actively learning to program and expanding my knowledge in both Frontend and Backend development. I also try to move forward outside of school in my free time, because I enjoy discovering new technologies, looking for effective solutions and moving forward.

chatapp.subtitle: Real-time chat application
chatapp.description: A simple chat application that allows users to communicate in real time. It uses a frontend in Next.js and a backend in Go. The database is in PostgreSQL. Here I learned how WebSockets work and how to implement them. You can find a live demo at the link below. The code is on my GitHub.

zvonek-web.subtitle: Website for Divadélko Zvonek
zvonek-web.description: A website for the puppet theater Zvonek in Hořice, of which I am a member. I created the site in the WordPress CMS, using the OceanWP theme and plugins such as Elementor, Advanced Custom Fields or Yoast SEO. In some places, I also added my own HTML and CSS code. I still maintain the website and occasionally write articles and news there. While creating it, I refreshed my experience with WordPress, and once again convinced myself that I won't be touching WordPress again for a while :)
